title: The Lost Archive
text:
[REDACTED]: Hello weary traveler! This is the LoreCut. If this is not where you intend to be... then LEAVE 
 
 [REDACTED}: Hello! By the looks of it, you have ended up in my humble speeder. I found you drunk in a bar a few kilometres back and figured I'd pick you up. What's this? You think you're being kidnapped? Uhm... No? Anyways, I'll let you out in a bit, first I want to give you something. 
 *You have recieved a datacore from [REDACTED]* 
 [REDACTED]: By the way, my name is *Archaos*, it's nice to meet you.

title: The Tricksterâ€™s Hint
text: A mysterious figure leaves you a clue scratched into a datapad...
